label: SearchIndexerKnowledgeStore
description: Definition of additional projections to azure blob, table, or files, of enriched data.

fields.label: Identity
fields.tooltip: The user-assigned managed identity used for connections to Azure Storage when writing knowledge store projections. If the connection string indicates an identity (ResourceId) and it's not specified, the system-assigned managed identity is used. On updates to the indexer, if the identity is unspecified, the value remains unchanged. If set to "none", the value of this property is cleared.

fields.label: Parameters
fields.tooltip: A dictionary of knowledge store-specific configuration properties. Each name is the name of a specific property. Each value must be of a primitive type.

fields.label: Projections
fields.tooltip: A list of additional projections to perform during indexing.

fields.label: Storage Connection String
fields.tooltip: The connection string to the storage account projections will be stored in.
